title: Rita Ora suffers a wardrobe mishap as she flashes her Spanx
text:
She's no stranger to a skimpy ensemble.

But Rita Ora's latest look accidentally left her underwear on display as she flashed her Spanx beneath a billowing scarlet gown on Monday.

The Falling To Pieces singer, 28, looked in good spirits as she left the Cartier London celebration at The Chiltern Firehouse, but inadvertently ended up revealing too much.

Whoops! Rita Ora accidentally had her underwear on display after a performance at The Chiltern Firehouse in London on Monday

The pop star suffered a wardrobe malfunction due to the high slit on the gown, which exposed her nude coloured Spanx shapewear.

The slight mishap aside, Rita turned heads for other reasons, as she accessorised the dress with a large headpiece.

She carried a simple clutch bag and showcased her toned thighs with knee high boots.

The Falling To Pieces hit maker, 28, donned a firetruck red ensemble for the Cartier London celebration, but couldn't stop the fabric revealing her beige Spanx

Malfunction: The pop star seemed to suffer a wardrobe malfunction as what looked like shapers underwear was seen beneath the fabric of her floor-length gown

It came just days after she flashed her bra underneath a sheer top which had a cold shoulder and a criss-cross lace-up detail on the sleeves.

She also showed off her briefs underneath a pair of black chaps as she put on an energetic display at the American Express Gold Event at Casino del Bosque.

Rita was vacationing in Ras al Khaimah last week to celebrate her sister Elena Ora's early birthday. She will turn 31 on Sunday.

Mishap: Other than the underwear issues Rita accessorised the dress with a large headpiece which gave the effect of having metal spikes protruding outwards

Drama: The large headpiece iconically showcased the rest of the outfit

Made up: Rita wore a dramatic bold red lip and highlighted her eyes with a winged black liner

Beads: A delicate beaded design was featured in a circle in the centre of the dress and again at the end of the sleeves

Yet Rita was quickly called back to London as she is currently filming for the modernised Oliver! remake.

Rita, whose previously starred in the Fifty Shades Of Grey franchise and alongside Jake Gyllenhaal in Southpaw, will star as Oliver's sidekick the Artful Dodger as the two get caught up in a heist to steal a priceless painting for master thief, Fagin.

MailOnline recently revealed Rafferty Law had landed the lead role in the re-imagining of Charles Dickens' enduring classic.

With Rita cast as the Artful Dodger, comedian David Walliams, 48, will play Losberne and Sir Michael Caine, 86, takes on the iconic role of Fagin.

How it should have looked: When the dress wasn't exposed Rita Ora's underwear the ensemble had a glamorous affect

Arrival: Rita left the Chiltern Firehouse hand in hand with her mother Vera Sahatciu

Stylish: Actress Wallis Day looked stunning in a shimmering black blazer which she paired with a black crop top and matching trousers

Dapper: Lad Mary Charteris and her husband, musician Robbie Furze looked every inch the happy couple at the venue

Beauty: Neelam Gill looked radiant for the evening in an all-black outfit with her raven locks slicked back
description: Rita Ora, 28, accidentally had her underwear on display for a different reason after a performance at The Chiltern Firehouse in London on Monday
